channel.title: Help locating a handler
channel.description:
Where can I locate this?
[code]server.playerHandler.players[playerFor];[/code]
Im trying to write a code and I need to do this:
[code]public static void spawnItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int playerFor) {[/code]
I already have this in my client:
[code]server.itemHandler.spawnItem(1025, absY, absX+4, 1, allplayers);[/code]
Im trying to wirte a code to spawn items for a drop party

item.title: Help locating a handler

item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

Where can I locate this?

server.playerHandler.players[playerFor];

Im trying to write a code and I need to do this:

public static void spawnItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int playerFor) {

I already have this in my client:

server.itemHandler.spawnItem(1025, absY, absX+4, 1, allplayers);

Im trying to wirte a code to spawn items for a drop party
